thread.title: Chance the Rapper coming to Scottrade Center
thread.title_full: Chance the Rapper coming to Scottrade Center

author: Kevin C. Johnson St. Louis Post-Dispatch
title: Chance the Rapper coming to Scottrade Center
text:
Kevin C. Johnson keeps you up-to-date on St. Louis’ busy music scene from concert reviews, concert announcements, artist interviews, nightlife happenings, local features and more. Close 1 of 2 The Associated Press 
Chance The Rapper accepts the award for best new artist at the 59th annual Grammy Awards on Sunday, Feb. 12, 2017, in Los Angeles. (Photo by Matt Sayles/Invision/AP) The Associated Press 
Chance the Rapper performs at the Clive Davis and The Recording Academy Pre-Grammy Gala at the Beverly Hilton Hotel on Saturday, Feb. 11, 2017, in Beverly Hills, Calif. (Photo by Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP) Chance the Rapper coming to Scottrade Center ( … ) The Associated Press 
Chance The Rapper accepts the award for best new artist at the 59th annual Grammy Awards on Sunday, Feb. 12, 2017, in Los Angeles. (Photo by Matt Sayles/Invision/AP) The Associated Press 
Chance the Rapper performs at the Clive Davis and The Recording Academy Pre-Grammy Gala at the Beverly Hilton Hotel on Saturday, Feb. 11, 2017, in Beverly Hills, Calif. (Photo by Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP) 
Grammy-winning rapper Chance the Rapper is at Scottrade Center with a concert on May 14. 
Tickets go on sale TODAY at 6 p.m. 
Tickets are at Ticketmaster outlets, ticketmaster.com , 800-745-3000 and at the the box office. Tickets are also at chanceraps.com . 
Tickets are $36.50-$76.50. 
During Sunday night’s Grammy Awards ceremony, Chance the Rapper won awards for best new artist and best rap album for "Coloring Book." Go! Sneak Peek e-newsletter Go! Sneak Peek from St. Louis Post-Dispatch
